alert.note: Alert for Christian; Greene; Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 1:58AM CST until February 27 at 2:45AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Webster County in southwestern Missouri... Northwestern Christian County in southwestern Missouri... Southeastern Greene County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 245 AM CST. * At 158 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Willard to near Republic to near Clever, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Springfield, Nixa, Ozark, Republic, Battlefield, Rogersville, Strafford, Clever, Fair Grove, Fremont Hills, Fordland, Brookline, Bassville, Turners, Northview, Linden, Boaz and Galloway. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 62 and 97. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
